Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.boardstate

Interface GameStateAbstract

All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandGameState, PlaceWorkerGameState, SpectatorGameState, WaitGameState
public interface GameStateAbstract
Interface that implements pattern State with all methods to handle the interaction by the user and updates from the server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleClick​(int x, int y)
    Called if the user clicked on the board.
    void handleClick​(BlockTypeEnum blockClicked)
    Called if the user clicked one of the Block Type Button.
    void handleClick​(TurnAction buttonPressed)
    Called if the user clicked one of the Action Button.
    void updateFromServer​(CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent event)
    Handle the CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent to handle the next user input.
    void updateFromServer​(CV_CommandRequestEvent event)
    Handle the CV_CommandRequestEvent to handle the next user input.

  • Method Details

    • handleClick

      void handleClick​(int x, int y)
      Called if the user clicked on the board.
      Parameters:
      x - X Coordinate of the click.
      y - Y Coordinate of the click.

    • handleClick

      void handleClick​(TurnAction buttonPressed)
      Called if the user clicked one of the Action Button.
      Parameters:
      buttonPressed - TurnAction of the Button pressed.

    • handleClick

      void handleClick​(BlockTypeEnum blockClicked)
      Called if the user clicked one of the Block Type Button.
      Parameters:
      blockClicked - BlockTypeEnum of the Button pressed.

    • updateFromServer

      void updateFromServer​(CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent event)
      Handle the CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent to handle the next user input.
      Parameters:
      event - The CV_CommandExecutedGameEvent received from the server.

    • updateFromServer

      void updateFromServer​(CV_CommandRequestEvent event)
      Handle the CV_CommandRequestEvent to handle the next user input.
      Parameters:
      event - The CV_CommandRequestEvent received from the server.
